metadata.name: Event Grid System Topic Event Subscriptions
metadata.description: This module deploys an Event Grid System Topic Event Subscription.
Required. The name of the Event Subscription.
Required. Name of the Event Grid System Topic.

Optional. Dead Letter Destination. (See https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/templates/microsoft.eventgrid/eventsubscriptions?pivots=deployment-language-bicep#deadletterdestination-objects for more information).

Optional. Dead Letter with Resource Identity Configuration. (See https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/templates/microsoft.eventgrid/eventsubscriptions?pivots=deployment-language-bicep#deadletterwithresourceidentity-objects for more information).

Optional. Delivery with Resource Identity Configuration. (See https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/templates/microsoft.eventgrid/eventsubscriptions?pivots=deployment-language-bicep#deliverywithresourceidentity-objects for more information).

Required. The destination for the event subscription. (See https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/templates/microsoft.eventgrid/eventsubscriptions?pivots=deployment-language-bicep#eventsubscriptiondestination-objects for more information).
Optional. The event delivery schema for the event subscription.
Optional. The expiration time for the event subscription. Format is ISO-8601 (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ).

Optional. The filter for the event subscription. (See https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/templates/microsoft.eventgrid/eventsubscriptions?pivots=deployment-language-bicep#eventsubscriptionfilter for more information).
Optional. The list of user defined labels.
Optional. The retry policy for events. This can be used to configure the TTL and maximum number of delivery attempts and time to live for events.
The name of the event subscription.
The resource ID of the event subscription.
The name of the resource group the event subscription was deployed into.
The location the resource was deployed into.
